utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So now, what is this now?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Guggly worm.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: And this?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Glow-pop giggly jammer.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You make it so funny.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey umm, what’s this?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ohh, a hunk of sandwich from last year.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ohh, Geller’s got one hooked! Ohh! Looks like a big one! Yeah, ohh! Ohh! It’s the classic struggle between man and— Someone knocked over a lamp.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That’s all right. Hey you guys, you know what’s going to be great about the fishing trip this year? When my dad gets me out in the middle of the lake and gives me that, "Joey, what are you doing with your life?" stuff. I can say, "Well, I’m doing a movie with Charlton Heston dad. What are you doing with your life?"

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Great!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You don’t have to stop having fun just because I’m here. Kathy didn’t cheat on all of you. Well, except you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, Joey, I don’t think that you should leave Chandler alone. I mean it’s only been two days since he broke up with Kathy. Maybe you can go fishing next week?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Look, there’s nothing I can do for him right now, he’s still in his sweat pants, that’s still Phase One. Y'know? I’ll be back for Phase Two, I would never miss Phase Two.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What’s Phase Two?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Gettin’ drunk and going to a strip club.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: How does going to a strip club help him better?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Because there are naked ladies there.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Which helps him get to Phase Three, picturing yourself with other women.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: There are naked ladies there too.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Would you give me one minute!! Please.

utterance.speaker: Joshua
utterance.content: So, these will match the jacket you picked out for me last week?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Um-hmm. There we go. There it is.

utterance.speaker: Joshua
utterance.content: Oh! You know what I need?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Joshua
utterance.content: Gloves. Brown, leather dress gloves.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, okay. Uhh, well let’s see. You’re about—well uh, this one is large. And this one—

utterance.speaker: Joshua
utterance.content: Also large?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah! Okay, two larges coming right up!

utterance.speaker: Joshua
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Waltham
utterance.content: Rachel! Could I have a moment?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Waltham
utterance.content: I-I was wondering, my niece you see is in from London—well Shropshire really but y’know—well she’s about your age I say. Anyway I have tickets for the opera, Die Fledermaus, and I was wondering if you’d like to keep her company this evening?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Sure. You got it. Great!

utterance.speaker: Mr. Waltham
utterance.content: Oh, good.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Me, Fledermaus, great. I really—

utterance.speaker: Mr. Waltham
utterance.content: Ohh! Yes of course, thank you, thank you, thank you so very much.

utterance.speaker: Joshua
utterance.content: So…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So?

utterance.speaker: Joshua
utterance.content: Gloves?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh! Right! Right, sorry, I’ll be right back!

utterance.speaker: Joshua
utterance.content: Uhh, actually y’know what, I kinda—I have to take off.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Joshua
utterance.content: But, I was curious; do you have any plans for tonight?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No! Nothing!

utterance.speaker: Joshua
utterance.content: I invested in this night-club and it’s opening tonight, would you like to come?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah! That would be great!

utterance.speaker: Joshua
utterance.content: You’re into hardcore S right?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, I-I guess—I…

utterance.speaker: Joshua
utterance.content: Kidding! I’m gonna get there early, but I’m going to put you on the V.I.P list, okay? Look for me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, great, you betcha!

utterance.speaker: Mr. Waltham
utterance.content: I almost forget the tickets, didn’t I?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Mr. Waltham
utterance.content: For you and Emily, tonight, Die Fledermaus.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh. Oh, right.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Waltham
utterance.content: I think you’ll like it, it has two out of the three tenors.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh yay!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y’know, I can’t believe Kathy did this too me. I really, thought that she was the one. I tell you what, from now on I’m never getting out of this chair, ever! Okay? From now on, this chair is the one! You wanna what else is the one? My sweat pants!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Come on, man! Just-just take the sweats off. Okay? Just take ‘em off and we’ll have some fun.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey-hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Catch any big fish?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh my God, you guys have no idea.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Oh! God! Wow!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You stink!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Are you kidding?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, three days on the lake without a shower. Plus! I fell in that big tub of worms at the bait stand! Hey, how-how’s he doing?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: He hasn’t gotten out of that chair in two days.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey buddy! How’s it going?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, see that? He just needed his pal to come home. All right, uh, I’ve got to go memorise my lines. Me and Charlton Heston bright and early tomorrow morning! Yeah-yeah!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey, Monica!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Uh-oh, what’s the matter?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh, it’s Joshua invited me to this fancy club opening tonight. But, I already told Mr. Waltham that I would take his niece to this dumb old opera. So… What are you gonna do?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I don’t know sweetie.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No! Help me!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I can’t! I have to work!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Phoebe?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I would, but I get my morning sickness in the evening.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ugh!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Unless! She wants to spend the night holding my hair back for me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh, gosh. You guys, come on, this is—I have to meet Joshua! This is my one chance for him to see the fun Rachel. Y’know the "Wouldn’t it be great if she was my wife" Rachel. Ohh, all right! Are Joey and Chandler back?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, Chandler’s still in Phase One, and Joey’s that thing you smell.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh! Hi!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So….

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohhhh, come on!!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I think she’s here.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No! Wait! Wait-wait! Ross, please!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You want me to take some girl I’ve never met to the opera so you can go to a club and flirt with some guy, hmm, that-that is a toughie.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ohh, she’s looking down the hall. Oh! She looked right at me! Oh wait, you can’t see people through that little hole, can you? Hello!

utterance.speaker: Woman
utterance.content: Hello!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’ll be right there! Okay, Ross, please come on! I thought we have moved on! I thought we’ve gotten to a place where we could be happy for each other! I mean was that just me?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All right, I’ll do it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh thank you! Thank you, thank you, thank you! Emily?

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: Yes.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’m Rachel Green.

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: Thank goodness.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: There’s been a teeny-teeny change in plans. It turns out that I’m not free tonight. So…

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: Really?! Well, that’s just lovely, isn’t it? I must’ve missed your call, even though I didn’t leave the flat all day.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh well, no I…

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: Oh, no-no-no, that’s not rude! It’s perfectly in keeping with a trip that I’ve already been run down by one of your wiener carts, and been strip-searched at John F. Kennedy Airport, apparently to you people, I look like someone who’s got a balloon full of cocaine stuffed up their bum.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I-I-I think you look great.

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: Good night, it was very nice to meet you all.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’ll get her.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Please hurry.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Don’t you just love the way they talk?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ohh!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: It kicked! I think the baby kicked!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh no wait, oh no, the elastic on my underwear busted.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh my God! I overslept! I was supposed to be on the set a half an hour ago! I gotta get out of here!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh wait, Joey, you can’t go like that! You stink!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Look, I know I feel asleep before I could shower and now I don’t have time! They’re just ten blocks away, if I run, I can make it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah. Run ten blocks, that’ll help the smell.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey—whoa, slow down. No, keep moving. Wow!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So? How did it go with Joshua last night?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, I didn’t see Joshua last night, but I did punch a girl in the face.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: The whole night was horrible, it was pouring down rain, and when I got there, there was no Rachel Green on the list, but there was a Rachel Greep.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ohh! So, did you get to meet her?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, there is no Rachel Greep, but then this other girl overheard us and she was all, "I’m Rachel Greep! I’m Rachel Greep!" and he let her right in.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So you hit her in the face?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, she was already in, but then this big bitch behind me tried to steal my umbrella, so I clocked her. Ohhh! I can’t believe this, all I wanted was a few hours outside of work to see Joshua, so he can go ahead and start falling in love with me.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Aww, Pheebs.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Honey, that’s you’re name.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That’s short for Phoebe?! I thought that was just what we called each other!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey! You’re wearing pants!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That’s right! Where are the guys? I’m ready to get drunk and see some strippers.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It’s 9:30 in the morning!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: They got a breakfast buffet.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hello. Oh, hey Ross!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ooh, let me talk to him!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh-oh, my God!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, can I just…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Shh!! Wait, what?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: She’s shhing me! It’s my phone and she’s shhing me!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Shhh!! Please! What’s he saying?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: He’s with Emily at a Bed and Breakfast in Vermont!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What? Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What? Who the hell is Emily— noooo!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: They’re in Vermont!! How could this happen?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ow!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: How—how did end up in Vermont with that awful witch?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Maybe, she doesn’t hit him all the time.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: When we first met her, she was soaking, her feet were wet! Who wouldn’t be miserable? I’m telling you when I got her into a dry pair of shoes, she was a totally different person.

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: Ross! Come quickly! There’s a deer just outside eating fruit from the orchard!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I’ve gotta go, there’s a deer just outside eating fruit from the orchard!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: He had to go, there’s a deer just outside eating fruit from the orchard.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I don’t get this! She was horrible!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, I’m going to go stand over there.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why do you care so much anyway?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I don’t care! All right, y’know what I’m just upset that I’m getting nowhere with Joshua that—y’know what still, you do not meet someone and go flitting off to Vermont!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, when you first met Barry, you flitted off to Vail.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, y’know, would you just for once, not remember every…little…thing!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So y’know, uh, when’s he getting back?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: A couple of days.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y’know, I knew something like this was going to happen.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What are you doing?! Chandler! You can’t just go back a phase!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes you can. You’re thinking about time, you can’t go back in time.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, look, why don’t you just, why don’t you do your Phase Two strip club thing with us.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, come on, we can be guys!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No you can’t.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Come on! Let us be guys! Maybe we want to be guys!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You don’t want to be guys, you’d be all hairy and wouldn’t live as long.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Y’know you, you just stop being such a wuss and get those off and you come with us and watch naked girls dance around!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I’m sorry.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! Joey Tribbiani! I’m here! I’m here!

utterance.speaker: The A.D
utterance.content: Calm down, we got time, we’re running a little late.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Look at that, Charlton Heston eating a liquorice whip!

utterance.speaker: The A.D
utterance.content: Yeah, we loves ‘em. I’ve never seen him with—

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Whoa! Yeah, what the hell is that? What smells so bad?

utterance.speaker: The A.D
utterance.content: You.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Y’know, I can see why you think that, but ah, actually, you know who I think it is?

utterance.speaker: The A.D
utterance.content: You?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No-no, it’s uh, it’s Heston.

utterance.speaker: The A.D
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, the man wreaks! Smells like he went on a three day fishing trip and then ate some liquorice.

utterance.speaker: The A.D
utterance.content: There’s no way he smells, he’s the only one around here with a shower in his dressing room.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Really, a shower huh? And uh, which-which room might that be?

utterance.speaker: The A.D
utterance.content: The one with "Heston" on it.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Interesting.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, I’ve got some Ones, you wanna put them in her panties?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No thanks, Mom!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, no umm, hi, that-that, you have to put that out, ‘cause I’m pregnant.

utterance.speaker: The Cigarette Smoking Guy
utterance.content: Well, maybe you and your baby should go to another strip club.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ha-ha, it’s not my baby, ha-ha-ha!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Very good, so good.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I really, really enjoyed it. Very exotic.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, I just checked our messages and Joshua didn’t call. I mean you’d think he’d be worried about me not showing up at his club. Ugh, you know what makes it so much worse, Ross is all happy in Vermont!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Come on! Look where you are!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: When you get a sec, another round of daiquiris.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Remember, a virgin for me please.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh! And don’t let me leave without getting the name of that carpet guy.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ahh, come on! Y’know what—y’know what, I think I’m just gonna go home and call Kathy.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, if you think it will help.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No! That was a test! In a couple of hours I’m gonna get really drunk and wanna call Kathy and you guys are gonna have to stop me! And then after that, I’m gonna get so drunk, I’m gonna wanna call Janice

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You should! How is she?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ohhh!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I think somebody needs another lap dance.

utterance.speaker: Charlton Heston
utterance.content: Hello! Who’s in there?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: How ya doin’?

utterance.speaker: Charlton Heston
utterance.content: Who in the hell are you?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I guess you wouldn’t believe me if I said I was Kurt Douglas, huh?

utterance.speaker: Charlton Heston
utterance.content: Put some pants on kid so I can kick your butt.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No-no-no, no, no, wait. You see, I’m an actor, Joey Tribbiani, I’m doing a scene with you today, and well, I stink.

utterance.speaker: Charlton Heston
utterance.content: You’re in this picture?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah-yeah, I’m one of the cops that won’t work with you ‘cause you a lose cannon. Anyway, look, I’m really sorry, but I stink!

utterance.speaker: Charlton Heston
utterance.content: Joey, right?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Charlton Heston
utterance.content: Every actor at one time or another—opp! Every actor thinks he stinks, even Lawrence Oliver at sometimes thought he stank, Bob Redford won’t even watch himself.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh no-no-no, you don’t understand…

utterance.speaker: Charlton Heston
utterance.content: Listen to me!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh yeah, yeah.

utterance.speaker: Charlton Heston
utterance.content: I don’t know one actor worth his salt that didn’t say at one time or another, "God, I stink!" Hell, I just did a scene out there, first take, I stunk the place up. But, the important thing you must remember, no matter how badly you think you might stink, you must never, ever bust into my dressing room and use my shower! Do you understand me?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yes sir! Yes sir, I’m-I’m—

utterance.speaker: Charlton Heston
utterance.content: Wait a minute! Take your pants.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah. Oh, yeah.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So, we did okay at the strip club, right?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh yeah, that was great. Thanks to you, the hottest cocktail waitress there is quitting to teach the third grade!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I can’t believe it! He still hasn’t called.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Who, Josh?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: It’s Joshua.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What, he doesn’t like Josh?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, I don’t.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right, well I’m gonna put my sweats back on.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh no! Wait! Wait! Okay, y’know what, you were right, you were right. We really weren’t great at being guys, but you know why? Because we’re girls.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: And do you know what girls are really good at?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Stripping!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, listening! Sit! Y’know, maybe it would just really, really help if you would just talk.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, come on! What’s going in on in there?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah. And y’know, if you wanna cry, that’s okay too.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, look, I’m gonna have to ask you all to leave.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Come on! Chandler!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Look, forget it. We tried, but Phase Three is a lost cause, Okay? Those strippers were insanely hot, and I couldn’t picture myself with any of them.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: They really were pretty, weren’t they?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, I really liked that fighter pilot one.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, Candy! She was so spunky!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Y’know, I think if I were going to be with a woman. It’d, it’d be with someone like Michelle, she was so oh, she was so petite.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: See, I don’t know, for me it would have to Chantal.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, Chantal!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my goodness, she had the smoothest skin! I mean when I stuck that dollar bill in her g-string and grazed her thigh…

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Phase Three! I just achieved Phase Three!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Really?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I am totally picturing you with all those women!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That’s-that’s not Phase Three.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, I’m there too!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, are we all together? Like in a group?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Stop it! You’re killing me! I think I just moved on to Phase Four!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh! What is that? What is that?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Where I don’t want to have a relationship ever! I just want to have sex with strippers and my friends!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Come on, let me see that smile.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don’t wanna.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Please?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I wanted to go to the strip club!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I know, I know, but you’re gonna have plenty of chances. There are literally thousands of women out there just waiting to screw me over.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, all right.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey—ooh so, how was Vermont?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Emily is…incredible. I mean there-there are no words to describe it, I mean the whole weekend was like a dream. Oh! And you! Rach!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey! You were so right!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh, what you said, about us being in a place where we could finally be happy for each other.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, hmm.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I mean, I, I-I admit I-I wasn’t quite there. Y’know, I mean the thought of you and that-that Josh guy…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joshua.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Joshua…guy at that club, dancing and having a good time, the thought of it kinda…y’know.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, I…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: But now! I’m there! I’m totally there! I’m-I’m finally where you are!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, thank goodness!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, and-and thank you for Emily.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, no problem. I’m so glad I could help. Happy for you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Happy for you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, happy for you!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right ladies, here’s what we’re gonna do. You are gonna take off my clothes. You two, go get the oils. And you just constantly scream at the top of your voice, "Chandler’s the king! Chandler’s the king!"

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I-I wanna be with her, I like her.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, that’s fine! Go with your instincts, go with your instincts.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wait, now, what am I doing again?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Come on! Would you please pay attention, I could wake up at any moment!

utterance.speaker: The Cigarette Guy
utterance.content: Hi, I’m Joshua, I’m here to pick up Rachel.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No-no-no, that’ not Joshua.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What do you want from me, I’ve never met the guy. So anyway, Rachel, I’m sorry you can’t stay, but the rest of us have a lot of work to do. What are you doing? All right, listen, I’ve got to wake up!
